Drop Cap Book Cover Exercise

Imagined book cover for Jonathan Strange and Mr Norrell by Susanna Clarke, with symbols of old magic and the characters who wield it.

Inspired by Jessica Hische's work on Penguin Drop Caps and prompted by the Skillshare class Lettering for Designers: One Drop Cap at a Time.
